name: sls-multi-offline
description: Tool that allows you to run multiple serverless api or db instance under for local development purposes

scripts.npmi: npm ${NODE_INSTALL_OPTIONS:-i} && cd $INIT_CWD/sample/db  && npm ${NODE_INSTALL_OPTIONS:-i} && cd $INIT_CWD/sample/posts && npm ${NODE_INSTALL_OPTIONS:-i} && cd $INIT_CWD/sample/users && npm ${NODE_INSTALL_OPTIONS:-i}
scripts.pub: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
